contents.item: There’s faith that knows itself as faith, Proyas, and there’s faith that confuses itself for knowledge. The first embraces uncertainty, acknowledges the mysteriousness of the God. It begets compassion and tolerance. Who can entirely condemn when they’re not entirely certain they’re in the right? But the second, Proyas, the second embraces certainty and only pays lip service to the God’s mystery. It begets intolerance, hatred, violence.
contents.owner: R. Scott Bakker, The Darkness That Comes Before

contents.item: No human mind can fully grasp the gift of Christ’s atonement, the vastness and inclusiveness of the act—but in the end, it comes down to just you and Jesus. You’ve come, and He’s met you with open arms—and now it’s just between the two of you.
Many things are impossible for men to do alone, but everything is possible with God. Regardless of how big your errors might have been, you will find forgiveness when you truly seek for it.
The fear of God is an insane idea. God is love and “there is no fear in love, because perfect love casts out all fear.
By holding on to God at all times, we can remain calm and enjoy peace in us even in the middle of our storms.
He wounds but he heals.
God of mercy!
The Repairer is a Restorer.
The righteous God promotes the cause of righteousness.
Faith in God is a possibility.
Great is God.
When we turned to God, He will heal us, then we shall be happy.
God is my strength.
God is my HOPE.
I don't believe in Religion. I believe in Connection, Relationship and Spirituality.
A man is measured by the depths of his commitments.
I am what I am and not what others make of me.

God’s mercy never fails so don’t live another moment in regret. Find the meaning of your life and discover your value by turning towards Him. Start dwelling on His unconditional love and limitless favor to live a joyful life.
Don’t allow the challenges of life to break you. Remember all the good things God has done, and fill your heart with faith

It’s only human to become impatient while waiting for God’s timing and His gifts. But fretting won’t help. Stretch your faith more and think of great possibilities because one touch of God’s favor can turn any situation around. Hold on to your peace and pray.
